summary: The PHP SDK fails to unmarshal DateInterval values during schedule operations, throwing 'Unrecognized date time interval format' when parsing the jitter field in ScheduleSpec.
userImpact: Users cannot list schedules; the SDK crashes when trying to retrieve schedule information from the server.
rootCause: The DateInterval parsing logic in DateInterval.php:109 does not recognize the date time interval format returned by the Temporal server for the jitter field.
resolutionDetails: The issue was fixed by updating the DateInterval parsing to handle the server's date time interval format.
